description:
Selects the first available (non-masked) pixel value across the temporal dimension. This uses the PixelSelectionMethod 'first' which feeds the mosaic array with the first valid pixel value encountered. This is useful for filling in masked/nodata areas with valid pixels from other timestamps.

Note: This is different from the 'first' function which returns data from the first timestamp chronologically. 'firstpixel' returns the first valid pixel value, filling masked areas.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: An array or data cube with temporal dimension.
